00023 #include "shared_queue.hpp"
00024 
00025 namespace uStreamLib {
00026         SharedQueue::SharedQueue(void)
00027         {
00028                 setClassID(UOSUTIL_RTTI_SHARED_QUEUE);
00029         }
00030 
00031         int32 SharedQueue::init(char* name, uint32 max_item_size, int32 capacity)
00032         {
00033                 int32 ret = 0;
00034 
00035                 // initialize parent
00036                 ret = SimpleQueue::init(name, max_item_size, capacity);
00037                 if (ret == FAILURE)
00038                         return FAILURE;
00039 
00040                 // create semaphores
00041                 ret = _sem_item_count.init(0);
00042                 if (ret == FAILURE)
00043                         return FAILURE;
00044 
00045                 ret = _sem_free_count.init(capacity);
00046                 if (ret == FAILURE)
00047                         return FAILURE;
00048 
00049                 // create mutexes
00050                 ret = _pmutex.init();
00051                 if (ret == FAILURE)
00052                         return FAILURE;
00053 
00054                 ret = _cmutex.init();
00055                 if (ret == FAILURE)
00056                         return FAILURE;
00057 
00058                 // ok
00059                 setOk(true);
00060                 return SUCCESS;
00061         }
00062 
00063         SharedQueue::~SharedQueue(void)
00064         {
00065                 // nothing to do
00066         }
00067 
00068         int32 SharedQueue::put(char* item, uint32 size)
00069         {
00070                 int32 ret;
00071 
00072                 _sem_free_count.wait();
00073 
00074                 _pmutex.lock();
00075                 ret = SimpleQueue::put(item, size);
00076                 _pmutex.unlock();
00077 
00078                 _sem_item_count.post();
00079 
00080                 return ret;
00081         }
00082 
00083         int32 SharedQueue::tryPut(char* item, uint32 size)
00084         {
00085                 int32 ret;
00086 
00087                 if (_sem_free_count.tryWait() == FAILURE)
00088                         return FAILURE;
00089 
00090                 ret = _pmutex.tryLock();
00091                 if (ret == FAILURE) {
00092                         _sem_free_count.post(); return FAILURE;
00093                 }
00094 
00095                 ret = SimpleQueue::put(item, size);
00096                 _pmutex.unlock();
00097 
00098                 _sem_item_count.post();
00099 
00100                 return ret;
00101         }
00102 
00103         int32 SharedQueue::get(char* item, uint32 size)
00104         {
00105                 int32 ret;
00106 
00107                 _sem_item_count.wait();
00108 
00109                 _cmutex.lock();
00110                 ret = SimpleQueue::get(item, size);
00111                 _cmutex.unlock();
00112 
00113                 _sem_free_count.post();
00114 
00115                 return ret;
00116         }
00117 
00118         int32 SharedQueue::tryGet(char* item, uint32 size)
00119         {
00120                 int32 ret;
00121 
00122                 if (_sem_item_count.tryWait() == FAILURE)
00123                         return FAILURE;
00124 
00125                 ret = _cmutex.tryLock();
00126                 if (ret == FAILURE) {
00127                         _sem_item_count.post(); return FAILURE;
00128                 }
00129 
00130                 ret = SimpleQueue::get(item, size);
00131                 _cmutex.unlock();
00132 
00133                 _sem_free_count.post();
00134 
00135                 return ret;
00136         }
00137 
00138         int32 SharedQueue::getCount(void)
00139         {
00140                 return _sem_item_count.getValue();
00141         }
00142 }
